DocAttribute.Name: ElevationOfRefHeight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Elevation above sea level of the reference height used for all storey elevation measures, equals to height 0.0. It is usually the ground floor level.

DocAttribute.Name: ElevationOfTerrain
DocAttribute.Documentation: Elevation above the minimal terrain level around the foot print of the building, given in elevation above sea level.

DocAttribute.Name: BuildingAddress
DocAttribute.Documentation: Address given to the building for postal purposes.
